caller-path

Get the path of the caller module

You can’t use module.parent as modules are cached and it will return the first caller module, not necessarily the current one.

Install

$ npm install --save caller-path

Usage

```js // foo.js var callerPath = require(‘caller-path’);

module.exports = function () { console.log(callerPath()); //=> /Users/sindresorhus/dev/unicorn/bar.js } ```

js // bar.js var foo = require('./foo'); foo();
